typ1:CustomerManagementException.typ2:faultDetails: msgID= systemName= errorData=<ctx:fault xmlns:ctx="http://www.bea.com/wli/sb/context"><ctx:errorCode>BEA-382031</ctx:errorCode><ctx:reason>WS-I Compliance failure (R2744): The value of the SOAPAction transport header must be double-quoted and have the following value: "http://services.uscellular.com/wsdl/enterprise/customer/customermanagement/v1_0#CustomerManagement_v1_0_Binding.getCustomerInfo".</ctx:reason><ctx:location><ctx:path>request-pipeline</ctx:path></ctx:location></ctx:fault>
